translation: But the self-controlled man, moving among objects with the senses restrained and free from attraction and repulsion, attains peace.
commentary: 2.64 free from attraction and repulsion? You but? objects objects? Indriyaih with senses? grazing moving (amongst)? selfrestrained by self-control? Vidheyatma the selfcontrolled? Prasadam to peace? acquires attains.Commentary The mind and the senses are naturally endowed with the two currents of attraction and repulsion.
